name: AssignedProduct
comment: Represents the products or services that are actually allocated to the customer or subscriber.
vf short description: Represents the products or services that are actually allocated to the customer or subscriber.

fields.name: AssignedProductSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: AssignedProductKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier for the assigned product in ALDM. Each assigned product key value represents a unique assigned product. Generated Key based on Assigned Product Id and Assigned Product Version Id

fields.name: CustomerSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SubscriberSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OrderActionSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: AssignedProductStateSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: PortationServiceProviderSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: AssignedProductStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key

fields.name: AssignedProductConvergedStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key for converged attribute

fields.name: AssignedProductStatusDate
fields.comment: BI Field: Indicates the date when the status of the assigned product changed.

fields.name: AssignedProductConvergedStatusDate
fields.comment: BI Field: Indicates the date when the converged status of the assigned product changed.

fields.name: EquipmentCatalogSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: AssignedProductFinalStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key

fields.name: AssignedProductFinalConvergedStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key for converged attribute

fields.name: ProductOfferSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: MainComponentFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the assigned product is a main component or a regular component.Values are:- 1 - Regular component.- 0 - Main component

fields.name: MainComponentSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: AddOnOfferSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ParentAssignedProductSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: AddressSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SalesChannelSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OrderModeInd
fields.comment: Specifies the order mode in which the specific assigned product version was ordered. For example, Delivery, Proposal.

fields.name: ItemActionTypeInd
fields.comment: Specifies the action type that caused this assigned product to be added or removed.

fields.name: PortationInd
fields.comment: Indicates the number portation type.Values are:In - Port inOut - Port outNone - Not ported //Customized per implementation

fields.name: ProvisionDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which an assigned product was provisioned. Product.activationdate

fields.name: ExpirationDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which the assigned product expired. If the value of this field is a future date, it indicates that the assigned product is still active. Product.terminationDate

fields.name: OrderStartDate
fields.comment: Indicates the start date of the order associated with the assigned product. Product.orderDate

fields.name: StartDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date from which the assigned product version is effective.For a assigned product version in the Ordered state, the field may be empty, or represents the due date of the order action according to specific application logic. Product.startDate

fields.name: EndDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date from which the assigned product version is no longer effective.It is populated only when there is a more current version for that assigned product, in which case this date is the START_DATE of the next version, or when the assigned product is no longer active. Product.startDate for the Pervious Assigned Product Version for a given Assigned Product Id//If no previous version i.e. the current version is the first then  - this will be default future date.

fields.name: BillStartDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which billing starts for the customer.

fields.name: CommittedFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether an item s order action has reached the committed milestone. Values are: - 1 - Reached the committed milestone.- 0 - Has not reached the committed milestone.

fields.name: BulkFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the product has been ordered as a bulk product or as a regular product.Values are:- 1 - Bulk product- 0 - Regular productNote: For non main items, the value of this field is always 0.

fields.name: TemporaryFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the product can be temporarily assigned to the subscriber.

fields.name: BulkQuantityNumber
fields.comment: Number of identical products ordered as a bulk order. All the identical products are handled as a single assigned product. For non main items, the value of this field is 1. Product.quantity

fields.name: CurrentFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the current version of the assigned product is the last version.Values are:- 1 - Last version- 0 - Old versions

fields.name: AssignedProductId
fields.comment: Identifies the assigned product in the source system. Product.productId

fields.name: AssignedProductVersionId
fields.comment: Indicates the version Identifer of the assigned product. Product.version

fields.name: CommitmentPeriod
fields.comment: Indicates the commitment period for the contract.

fields.name: CommitmentStartDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which commitment period starts for a contract.

fields.name: CommitmentEndDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which commitment period ends for a contract.

fields.name: TemplateId
fields.comment: Indicates the Business Offer Template from which this assigned product was created.

fields.name: ProductCatalogSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: DeliveryMethodSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ServiceTypeInd
fields.comment: Indicates the service or product type.

fields.name: MigratedFromAssignedProductId
fields.comment: Unique identifier for the product  from which the assigned product has been migrated .

fields.name: MigratedToAssignedProductId
fields.comment: Unique identifier for the product  to which the assigned product has been migrated .

fields.name: PrimaryServiceId
fields.comment: Possible to set either an attribute or a resource as the primary identifier of a component. Accordingly, the primary identifier value is either the value of the attribute or the resource, depending on the component setting.Note: Primary identifier is applicable for both the regular and main components.

fields.name: TemplateVersion
fields.comment: Indicates the Business Offer Template Version from which this assigned product was created.

fields.name: ProductTypeInd
fields.comment: Indicates the Assigned Product type.Values are:F - General TermsT - Business Offer TemplateP - Shared Service PlanS - SubscriptionR - Regular

fields.name: BssCreationDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which a record was created in the source system //Customized per implementation

fields.name: BssModificationDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which a record was modified in the source system //Customized per implementation

fields.name: ModificationEmployeeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: AssignedProductReasonSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OrderSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: AttributeList
fields.comment: Indicates the dynamic attribute list which contains the parameters assigned at run time.

fields.name: AssignedMainComponentId
fields.comment: Indicates the main item of this assigned billing offer.

fields.name: ServiceId
fields.comment: Indicates the service id of the assigned item.

fields.name: ProposalSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: FrameworkAgreementSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CustomerSiteSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ProjectOrderSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: BusinessGroupSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ProductTemplateSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OrderActionId
fields.comment: The order action that created the version of Assigned Product.

fields.name: CampaignExperienceSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: BenefitId
fields.comment: Description missing in ALDM

fields.name: WebUsageSessionSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: AppUsageSessionSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: AssignedProductConnectReasonSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: AlternateAssignedProductId
fields.comment: The alternateID of the assigned product, unique integer identifier for specific product, product may be retrieved also upon it Product.alternateId

fields.name: BundleFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the assigned product represents a bundle Product.isBundle

fields.name: VisibleToCustomerFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether a related party can view the product Product.isCustomerVisible

fields.name: AssignedProductName
fields.comment: Name of the product. It could be the same as the name of the product offering. Product.name

fields.name: ProductSerialNumber
fields.comment: The serial number of the product Product.productSerialNumber

fields.name: PathToRootDesc
fields.comment: List of products that construct the product tree (comma sperated delimited) Product.pathToRoot

fields.name: RootAssignedProductSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: BillingArrangementSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: PrimaryAssignedProductSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OrderItemSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: InvoiceAddressSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ShippingAddressSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: MailingAddressSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
